name: Forced Partners (GMTK Jam 2021)
description:
This is my game for the GMTK Jam 2021!

I joined in late so I had less time and overall, I didn't work as much on it as I want to admit, but although it's unfinished af, I like the idea I had so I think about finishing it at some point!

The Jam's theme was: Joint Together!

You play as two wrongly accused prisoners on the run. They are held together by handcuffs. The left one can walk faster while the right one can jump higher, so use their abilities to your advantage in the three levels which all have their own unique ways of being hard!

It's a very short game with a very short time limit made in a very short amount of time!
